content: this is a legal case in slovenia where the supreme court made a decision on september 5 2019 the court determined the division of assets between former spouses including a real estate property funds in bank accounts and shares in different companies the court confirmed a 50 division of assets for each party the defendant appealed the decision but the second instance court upheld the judgment the defendant then brought an action for revision of the judgment but it was dismissed the court also addressed issues regarding the ownership of a house financial contributions and procedural irregularities the court of appeal found fault with the previous courts decision and the case will proceed to the next stage the court also made a decision regarding the costs of the review proceeding ordering the defendant to pay

metadata.CASE_ID: Sodba Vrhovnega sodišča RS II Ips 211/2018, 5. 9. 2019
